General.Name: Shanghai Luoman Lighting Technologies Inc.
General.Description: Shanghai Luoman Lighting Technologies Inc. provides urban and rural landscape lighting solutions in China. The company offers overall lighting planning, landscape lighting design and construction, and other services, such as centralized remote-control management services. Shanghai Luoman Lighting Technologies Inc. was founded in 1999 and is based in Shanghai, China.

2.Name: Chen  Zhang
2.Title: Director, Deputy Gen. Mang. and Financial Controller
